policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information
policy.content:
Last Updated: January 1, 2025

Information Collection

We collect information you provide directly to us when using our services, including your email address and account information.

Information Use

We use your information to:

  • Provide and maintain our services
  • Notify you about changes to our services
  • Allow you to participate in interactive features
  • Provide customer support
  • Monitor the usage of our services

Information Protection

We implement various security measures to protect your personal information, including encrypted storage and transmission.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms and conditions for using our services
terms.content:
Last Updated: January 1, 2025

Service Acceptance

By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

Service Description

We provide API base routing services that allow users to manage and configure their API endpoints.

User Responsibilities

You agree to:

  • Use the service only for lawful purposes
  • Not interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of the service
  • Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

Service Changes

We reserve the right to modify or terminate the service at any time without notice.
